name: Luis Faria
summary: Luis Faria is a Fullstack Software Engineer and Technical Project Manager with 10+ years of experience in building scalable SaaS, CRM, and ERP systems. He blends strong engineering skills with delivery leadership to ship high-impact digital products. He has led and coded projects involving Django, FastAPI, React, Next.js, GraphQL, and DevOps, and is pursuing a Master's in Software Engineering and AI at Torrens University.
current_focus: Building AI-enabled business tools and dashboards with Django, Streamlit, and FastAPI. Also open to sponsorship and leadership roles in software engineering or technical product management.

projects.name: Konquista
projects.description: WhatsApp CRM microSaaS used by 20+ clinics, automating 30K+ messages/month. Built with Django, Redis, Celery, and Docker. Open-sourced at https://github.com/lfariabr/konquest

projects.name: BI Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time analytics platform replacing Excel workflows, built with Streamlit + FastAPI, integrating GraphQL ERP data.

projects.name: ML Lead Scoring
projects.description: Lead scoring and segmentation pipeline using Scikit-Learn and GenAI for targeting optimization
projects.impact: Improved conversion tracking and marketing ROI by 15%

projects.name: ERP Integrations
projects.description: Led ERP implementation and integrations across sales, finance, and marketing using Laravel + GraphQL

projects.name: DevLab
projects.description: Mentorship initiative training junior devs and promoting internal tech culture
projects.impact: 3 junior developers mentored, 1 open-source repo launched

experience.title: Software Engineer / Project Lead
achievements: Built dashboards and lead scoring tools
Managed $500K+ annual ad budget with BI dashboards
Automated ad campaigns and analytics pipelines
Integrated GenAI assistant into WhatsApp workflows

education.degree: Master's in Software Engineering and AI
BA in Systems Analysis and Development
